instructions: Put the dinner plate on the table near the bottom and slightly to the left.
Place the fork tines up to the left of the dinner plate.
Place the salad fork tines up to the left of the dinner fork.
Place the knife to the right of the dinner plate blade up and cutting edge towards the plate.
Place the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife with blade up and cutting edge towards plate.
Place soup spoon to the right of knifes with bowl at top.
Place water glass to the right of plate near the top.
Place wine glass about an inch to the right of water glass.
Place wine glass to right of other wine glass and slightly lower.
Place saucer with cup on top handle to the right and spoon at top to the right of spoon.
Place bread plate to left of plate above forks.
Place butter knife in upper right of bread plate with plate up.
Place dessert fork above plate with tines to the right.
Place dessert spoon above dessert fork with bowl on the right.
Place napkins in upper middle of plate with leaf facing up.
